comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: I'm going to guess that she was the second wife of Charles Hall Dillon, U.S. Representative from South Dakota (1913-1919), and later a South Dakota Supreme Court Justice. bioguide.congress.gov/scripts/biodisplay.pl?index=D000348 Married, September 26, 1900, to Frances D. Jolley. politicalgraveyard.com/bio/dilas-dills.html
